denom.description: the token denomination to be transferred

amount.description: the token amount to be transferred

receiver.description: the recipient address on the destination chain

FungibleTokenPacketData.title: Fungible Token Packet Data
FungibleTokenPacketData.description: FungibleTokenPacketData defines a struct for the packet payload See FungibleTokenPacketData spec: https://github.com/cosmos/ics/tree/master/spec/ics-020-fungible-token-transfer#data-structures
